hero.core_tension: The split-second decision to accelerate a 'first-look' campaign as the physical countdown hits the last moments — operator and studio must choose which week to time-box for peak impact.
hero.setting: Shadowed loading-dock adjacent to a flagship storefront; a narrow strip of storefront glass and a studio van door form the negative-space frame (no screens or literal UI).
hero.action: Low three-quarter angle: an operator slides a brushed-brass stopwatch across a weathered wood clipboard to a studio art director who nods and taps a printed week-by-week test card — the stopwatch face shows an implied countdown.
props: brushed-brass stopwatch (prominent)
weathered wood clipboard with printed campaign grid (no visible text)
sample product box with matte finish
metal binder clip and ballpoint pen
coffee cup with condensation ring
hero.lighting: Cinematic dark-mode: hard rim light from upper-left, soft fill from storefront glow at lower-right, deep shadows and generous negative space to emphasize the stopwatch silhouette.
hero.mood: Moody, urgent, collaborative, disciplined; tension balanced with quiet confidence.
hero.alt: Low three-quarter shot at dusk: an operator slides a brass stopwatch across a wood clipboard toward a studio art director by a storefront, rim-lit faces and deep shadows emphasize the countdown moment.

signal_map.structure: Radial geometry of concentric rings and sparse network nodes laid over a matte black plane; rings tighten toward a small illuminated aperture labeled conceptually as the 'YES window' (no text rendered in image), with negative space around the outer rings.
elements: 'YES window' as a small recessed aperture of warm light
signal_map.motion: Slow, mechanical pulses travel inward along the rings and node paths; each pulse compresses rhythmically until multiple flows converge and collapse into the single 'YES window' aperture at center.
signal_map.palette: Deep charcoal and midnight blue base, muted amber/amber-brass highlights at convergence, cool slate metal for rings, frosted-glass node accents; heavy use of negative (black) space.
signal_map.alt: Dark radial diagram: concentric matte-metal rings and frosted nodes pulse inward along filaments until all signals converge into a small illuminated 'YES window' at the center, set against deep negative space.
